display_long_description:
HELLFIRE RAMPAGE VR is an action-based combat game that blends shooting and melee fighting mechanics.

You are a genius portal inventor who has detected an abnormal signal from another world.
After investigating, you discover that hellish creatures are collecting magical crystal essences and preparing to invade the HUMANITY

-> YOUR MISSION IS TO STOP THEIR INVASION AND COLLECT THE CRYSTALS !

Use your ability to slow time and take on powerful enemies in intense battles.
[BULLET TIME + DASH] is a toxic combination for tactical movements and survival.

-> REFLECT BULLETS BACK BY RICOCHET WITH ANY WEAPON

Combine a magic wand with a talisman or a shotgun with a sickle.
Launch fireballs, swing a lightsaber, throw shurikens, or even play a demonic kalimba.
The arsenal is packed with epic gear, from chainsaws to crossbows and beyond!
Get ready to test around 30+ non-trivial guns!


Face dangerous hordes and destroy their source.
Prepare to meet skeletons, imps, demons, hellhounds and mad ravens,
undead summon kings, skull queens, giant devils, toxic moths and others...

-> HELL CREATURES WILL NOT LET YOU TO GET BORED!

The most thrilling and intense fights are waiting for you.

Around 70+ challenges from different mysterious locations

-> GET READY TO SWEAT IN MORTAL CHALLENGES

🏆 Are you brave enough to challenge the HELL?
